title: AGI is Still 30 Years Away — Ege Erdil & Tamay Besiroglu

metadata.summary: In this episode, Ege Erdil and Tamay Besiroglu, co-founders of Mechanize, share their perspectives on the future of AI. They challenge the common framing of "alignment" and the plausibility of an intelligence explosion, instead focusing on the potential for rapid economic growth. They discuss their 2045+ timelines, the limitations of current AI models, and the factors that will drive future advancements. The conversation covers topics such as the automation of work, the impact of AI on the economy, and the challenges of predicting the future.

topClaims.text: The whole idea of the intelligence explosion is mistaken or misleading.
By the end of 2026, AI models may achieve the capability to book flights accurately and handle other basic tasks.
By 2027, AI compute power will increase by ten times compared to current levels.
China's economy could achieve a transformative 30 percent growth per year, surpassing historical growth rates seen during the Industrial Revolution.

topQuotes.text: The whole idea of the intelligence explosion is mistaken or misleading.
By the end of 2026, AI models may achieve the capability to book flights accurately and handle other basic tasks.
An intelligence explosion in the next few years will lead to 10X more compute for AI by 2027.
30 percent growth per year is transformative in concrete terms.

topTopics.name: intelligence explosion
topTopics.description: The concept of an intelligence explosion in AI.

topTopics.name: explosive growth
topTopics.description: The potential for explosive economic growth.

topTopics.name: china ai
topTopics.description: The role of China in AI development.

snippet.title: AGI is Still 30 Years Away — Ege Erdil & Tamay Besiroglu

localized.title: AGI is Still 30 Years Away — Ege Erdil & Tamay Besiroglu
localized.description:
Ege Erdil and Tamay Besiroglu have 2045+ timelines, think the whole "alignment" framing is wrong, don't think an intelligence explosion is plausible, but are convinced we'll see explosive economic growth (with the economy literally doubling every 1 or 2 years).

This discussion offers a totally different scenario than my recent interview with Scott and Daniel.

Ege and Tamay are the co-founders of https://www.mechanize.work/, a startup dedicated to fully automating work. Before founding Mechanize, Ege and Tamay worked on AI forecasts at https://epoch.ai/

Read the transcript: https://www.dwarkesh.com/p/ege-tamay
Apple Podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/agi-is-still-30-years-away-ege-erdil-tamay-besiroglu/id1516093381?i=1000703894255
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/68eeIiy3mT6PRlrTej9dtq?si=8bd51bdc846e47f6

----------------------------------------

(01:33:34) - Will there be a separate AI economy?

(02:30:22) - Is superintelligence a real thing?

metadata.shortSummary: Ege Erdil and Tamay Besiroglu discuss their views on Artificial General Intelligence (AGI), predicting it's still decades away, and explore the potential for explosive economic growth driven by AI.
